Class Utilities.ReadWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.acme.core.Utilities.ReadWriter
  • Enclosing class:
    Utilities

    static class Utilities.ReadWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    An internal class that handles reading and writing functions.

    • Method Detail

      • write

        public static void write(java.lang.String[] lines,
         java.lang.String path)

      • write

        public static void write(java.lang.String line,
         java.lang.String path)
        Writes the given String to the file specified by path.
        Parameters:
        line - - a String array containing the text to be written
        path - - the path to the file which line should be written
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if path does not point to a valid file

      • readAll

        public static java.lang.String[] readAll(java.lang.String path)
        Reads all text data from the file specified by path.
        Parameters:
        path - - the path specifying the file be read
        Returns:
        a String array containing the data in the text file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if path does not point to a valid file
        See Also:
        BufferedReader}, {@link FileReader}

      • read

        public static java.lang.String[] read(java.lang.String path,
                      int max)
        Reads the given number of lines from the file specified by path.
        Parameters:
        path - - The path specifying the file to be read
        max - - The number of lines that should be read from the file
        Returns:
        A String array of length max containing the lines read from path
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if path does not point to a valid file
        See Also:
        BufferedReader}, {@link FileReader}
